attributes.action: IMPLEMENT A 1 HOUR MEALBREAK DURING THE SHIFT OR A 1 HOUR CUTAWAY AT THE END OF IT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enough of a 1/2 hour unpaid meal break and unpredictable cutaways depending upon who's on !

Lets pull together & get this one read in the House of Lords instead of Jade Goody matters !!
